record.dc:title: 5-57 Irwin Village Sites 11CP5 and 12CP5, Campbell Co., TN. Mound 1. Feature 1, Ten irregularly sized stones placed in a line and on their edges. These stones extend over a distance of 32 feet 6 inches.
record.wpa:narrative: These stones are irregular in size and shape, some being 24" in diameter others 4". The material is limestone. No order in spacing is apparent but the dominance of the duo ratio is noticed. The length of the stones is as follows starting at stake three: 24", 14", 4", 10", 13", 6", 14", 9", 14", and 7". A diagram is appended to show the direction of the line.
